mapper.select:
select
,
from ci_orchestration o left join ci_orchestration_pipeline op on op.orchestration_id=o.id where o.id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} order by op.priority

select
from ci_orchestration where del_flag!=1
AND name LIKE CONCAT('%','${name}','%')
and organization_code in
#{organizationCode}
